introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: We, at The Store, a limited liability company registered under company registration number 0000000000 with its registered office at The Store Address and our affiliated companies ('we', 'our') respect the privacy of all our users and are committed to protecting the personal data collected through the Website, the websites of our affiliated companies, and the associated mobile applications. This Privacy Policy ('Privacy Policy') sets out the basis on which we collect and use any of your personal data, whether collected directly from you or through other sources, in connection with your access to the Platform or any services provided by us and your use of them, including promotional messages and any social media functions on the Platform (collectively referred to as the 'Services'). We understand the importance you place on your personal data and are committed to protecting and respecting your privacy. Please read this Privacy Policy carefully to understand our practices regarding your personal data. By using the Platform and Services, you agree to the collection and handling of your personal data in accordance with this Privacy Policy. For the purposes of this Privacy Policy, 'Personal Data' includes the categories of data outlined in Section 2 of this Privacy Policy. References to 'User' or 'you' (or similar) refer to you as an individual or legal entity, as applicable. The Platform may include links to third-party websites, plug-ins, and applications. Clicking on those links or enabling those connections may allow third parties to collect or share data about you. We do not control these third-party websites and are not responsible for their privacy notices/statements. When you leave our Platform, we encourage you to read the privacy notice of every website you visit.

no_children_data.title: 1. We Do Not Collect Data About Children
no_children_data.content: This Platform is not intended for anyone who has not reached the age of majority under the applicable regulations governing such individuals. However, we cannot prevent specific users, including children, from fraudulently misrepresenting their age to gain access to the Platform. If you are a parent or guardian and believe we may have collected information about your child, please contact us immediately as outlined in Section 12 of this Privacy Policy.

personal_data_collected.title: 2. What Personal Data Do We Collect From and/or About You?
personal_data_collected.content: We collect your data to provide and continuously improve the Platform and Services. Personal Data refers to any information that can identify you as an individual based on identification tools. Personal Data does not include anonymized data, i.e., datasets from which individual identifiers have been removed. We collect, use, store, and transfer various types of Personal Data about you, categorized as follows:
personal_data_collected.identity_data: Identity Data includes details such as: your first name, middle name, last name, your username or similar identification tools, gender, title, nationality, and date of birth.
personal_data_collected.contact_data: Contact Data includes your address, email address, and phone number.
personal_data_collected.transaction_data: Transaction Data includes information about amounts paid to you and by you, including but not limited to your payment methods, as well as details of the products and services you have purchased from us.
personal_data_collected.technical_data: Technical Data includes your Internet Protocol (IP) address, login data, browser type and version, operating system, mobile application version, time zone settings, location, device type, advertiser IDs (for iOS users), and information about your general internet usage (e.g., through the use of technology that stores information on your device or accesses it, such as cookies, pixel-based tracking, web beacons, and other technologies used to access our Website).
personal_data_collected.profile_data: Profile Data includes your username and password, interests, preferences, comments, preferred language, and survey responses.
personal_data_collected.purchase_data: Purchase Data includes all previous orders and purchases made from the same user account, refund information, fulfillment information, and page view information from service providers that enable commercial differentiation, fulfillment, and other operations on the Platform.
personal_data_collected.browser_data: Browser Data relates to how you interact with our Website, products, and services.
personal_data_collected.marketing_communication_data: Marketing and Communications Data covers your preferences for receiving marketing materials from us and third parties and your communication preferences.
personal_data_collected.aggregated_data: Additionally, we collect, use, and share statistical or demographic information ('Aggregated Data'). Aggregated Data is derived from your Personal Data but may be modified to remove identification tools and does not reveal your identity directly or indirectly. For example, we may collect Aggregated Personal Data from browser data to determine the percentage of users accessing a specific feature on the Website.

how_we_collect_data.title: 3. How Do We Collect Your Personal Data?

direct_methods.title: Directly
direct_methods.content: We collect your Personal Data directly from you through the Platform when you: register on the Platform and other joint registrations (e.g., social media login registrations) to subscribe to our Services and post content on the Platform; make payments and request refunds and payment methods; participate in competitions, promotions, and special schemes; provide opinions, testimonials, or comments; submit support requests or complaints on the Platform for refunds, fraud transactions, and exchanges, among other things; maintain a record of correspondence if you contact us via your phone, email, or otherwise; browse and perform other activities on the Platform.

indirect_methods.title: Indirectly
indirect_methods.content: We also receive Personal Data about you from your friends/relatives when they make purchases on your behalf and from our vendors/third-party service providers who enable you to access our Services seamlessly. Our vendors include: logistics, fulfillment, and/or partner service providers; marketing service providers; your interactions with us on other platforms such as Facebook, Google, and the like; payment service providers. If you share any third-party Personal Data (e.g., friends, relatives, or colleagues) with us while using our Services, you guarantee that you have obtained the consent of the individual concerned to share their Personal Data with us in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

automatic_methods.title: Automatically
automatic_methods.content: Certain Personal Data about you is collected automatically when you use our Services through logs, cookies, and other unique identification tools. We use logs to collect specific Personal Data about you. Log information represents data about your use of the Services, such as: IP address, browser type, referral/exit pages, operating system, timestamps, and related data stored in logs. We also use a limited number of cookies. Cookies represent small data files transferred to your computer (or any other device) when used to access our Services. Cookies are used for many purposes, including enabling specific features of our Services, remembering your preferences, equipment, browsing actions, and patterns to better understand how you interact with our Services, providing you with advertisements within and outside the scope of the Services, monitoring usage by visitors, and directing data traffic over the internet. To the extent permitted by your preferred web browser, you can instruct your browser by changing its options to stop accepting cookies or to remind you before accepting any cookies from the Services you visit online. We use cookie services to enhance your experience by remembering your online behavior while using the Platform and improving the efficiency of advertisements and Services. If you do not agree to our use of cookies, we request that you stop using the Platform immediately. For more information about cookies and how they are used, please read our Cookie Notice.

how_we_collect_data.optional_data: It is up to you to provide certain Personal Data, but this may affect your ability to benefit from many of our Services.

purpose_of_data_collection.title: 4. Why Do We Collect Your Personal Data?
purpose_of_data_collection.content: We collect and use your Personal Data for the following purposes: to provide you with information, products, or services you request from us or that we feel may interest you, where you have consented to be contacted for these purposes; to provide you with location-based Services, such as advertisements, search results, and other customized content; to fulfill our obligations arising from any contracts entered into between you and another entity using our Platform or between you and us; to improve our Services and deliver better and more personalized Services to you, including contacting you regarding the Services through various channels (e.g., by phone, messages, email, and instant messaging applications); to ensure that content from our Platform is presented in the most effective manner for you and the device you use to access our Platform; to provide you with Services and offers without interruption on special occasions such as your birthday and anniversary; to notify you of changes to our Services; for any other reason we deem necessary to enhance your experience using the Platform; to manage and organize our incentive programs and fulfill your requests for incentives and/or allow you to participate in sweepstakes and notify you if you win sweepstakes prizes; to provide functionality, analyze performance, fix errors, and improve the usability and effectiveness of the Services; to comply with local regulations (e.g., your nationality and/or identification documents to complete cross-border shipments, vendor information regarding place of establishment, and bank account information for identity verification and other purposes); to avoid, detect, and prevent fraudulent activities and misuse to protect the security of our customers, ourselves, and others.

how_we_use_data.title: 5. How Do We Use Your Personal Data?
how_we_use_data.contract_execution: Contract Execution: We need to use your Personal Data to fulfill any contract entered into with you or to take preliminary steps before entering into any contract. This includes accepting the applicable terms and conditions or specific terms related to our Services. If you do not provide Personal Data for these purposes, we may not be able to provide our Services or enter into any contract with you, which may result in service cancellation. We will inform you if this happens.
how_we_use_data.regulatory_compliance: Regulatory or Legal Compliance: We may collect your Personal Data to comply with any applicable regulations and/or laws.
how_we_use_data.legitimate_interests: Legitimate Interests: We may process your Personal Data based on our legitimate business interests and those of our customers when we improve our Services, detect and prevent fraud and misuse to protect the security of our customers, ourselves, or others, and when we provide you with interest-based advertisements.
how_we_use_data.marketing_communications: Marketing and Communications Data: We may also use your Personal Data to provide you with information about goods and services that may interest you and to enhance your Platform experience through service messages, new features, improvements, special offers, and events that interest you. We may contact you via various channels, including but not limited to emails, instant notifications, web notifications, posts, phone, in-app messages, WhatsApp messages, and news feed cards. We also provide you with the option to receive these advertisements based on your interests. You can opt out of receiving these advertisements by contacting us at the details mentioned in Section 12 of this Privacy Policy and/or by clicking the 'Unsubscribe' button in your email or any marketing communications we send you.

data_sharing.title: 6. With Whom Do We Share Your Personal Data?
data_sharing.content: Your Personal Data is important to us for providing our Services, and we are not in the business of sharing your Personal Data with others. We only share your information with third parties as described below and with companies that follow protective practices at least as stringent as those described in this Privacy Policy:
data_sharing.affiliated_companies: Other Companies: We provide our Services, and we may engage with our affiliated companies and/or non-affiliated service providers (e.g., logistics companies contracted to deliver products to you, marketing companies, payment processing companies to process online transactions, data analytics, and more) and share your Personal Data with these companies. We may engage other companies in your transactions, which may store your information in a digital wallet to make your use of our Services more efficient. You understand that it is important for these companies to access relevant Personal Data to perform their functions and tasks. We will ensure that these companies do not use your Personal Data for other purposes. We may also receive Personal Data from these companies (e.g., updated delivery and address information), which we may use (e.g., to correct our records and deliver your next purchases). These companies will be contractually obligated to respect the confidentiality of your Personal Data and not use it for any other purposes.
data_sharing.third_parties: Third Parties: We may share your Personal Data with any third party for the purposes outlined in Section 5 above. However, we ensure that all companies follow protective practices at least as stringent as those described in this Privacy Policy. We also do not allow our non-affiliated third-party service providers to use your Personal Data for their own purposes and only permit them to process your Personal Data for specific purposes in accordance with our instructions. You can request that we or the third party stop sending you marketing communications at any time by specifying your marketing preferences on the Platform, following unsubscribe links in any marketing message sent to you, or contacting us via email at any time.
data_sharing.google_recaptcha: Use of Google reCAPTCHA: We use Google reCAPTCHA on our Website to protect against spam and abuse and to ensure the security of our Services. reCAPTCHA works by collecting device and software information, such as device and application data, and sending it to Google for analysis. The use of reCAPTCHA is subject to Google's Privacy Policy and Terms of Service. By interacting with reCAPTCHA, your use of the service is subject to these policies.
data_sharing.promotional_activities: Additionally, you may be required to provide additional Personal Data to participate in some of our market research activities, including competitions and promotions (e.g., additional Personal Data to determine your eligibility to win a prize). This Personal Data may be collected by us or by our participating sponsors or vendors for the promotion. If you choose not to provide certain Personal Data, you may not be able to benefit from the competitions and promotions. If you decide to participate, please be aware that you should review the third-party privacy policies to understand how they use any Personal Data collected.
data_sharing.business_transfers: Business Ownership Transfers: As our business evolves, we may engage in the purchase or sale of other companies or services. In these transactions, customer Personal Data is typically included in the transferred assets but will remain protected by any existing privacy policy (unless the customer naturally agrees otherwise). In the event of our acquisition or a significant portion of our assets being acquired, customer Personal Data will be included as part of the transferred assets.
data_sharing.platform_protection: Platform and Others Protection: We release users' Personal Data when we believe such release is appropriate to comply with the law, law enforcement investigations, and to protect our rights, the rights of our users, or others, their property, or safety. This includes exchanging Personal Data with other companies and organizations for various reasons, such as fraud protection and reducing credit risks.

data_transfer_outside_saudi.title: 7. Is My Personal Data Transferred Outside Saudi Arabia?
data_transfer_outside_saudi.content: To facilitate providing our Services to you, it may sometimes be necessary for us to share your Personal Data with other members of the Noon group of companies and service providers located outside Saudi Arabia. Such transfers are necessary for reasons including, but not limited to, IT infrastructure, data storage, and Platform management, including payment processing. When we transfer Personal Data outside Saudi Arabia, we ensure that the Personal Data is transferred in accordance with this Privacy Policy and as stipulated by the laws applicable within Saudi Arabia.

data_storage.title: 8. How Do We Store Your Personal Data and For How Long?
data_storage.content: The Personal Data we collect from you may be transferred, stored, and processed by employees working for us or one of our service providers. These employees may, among other things, be engaged in fulfilling your order, processing your payment details, and providing support services. We will store your information as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes specified in this Privacy Policy or as permitted or required by law. To determine the appropriate retention period for Personal Data, we consider the amount, nature, and sensitivity of the Personal Data, the potential risks of harm from unauthorized use or disclosure of your Personal Data, the purposes for which we process your Personal Data and whether we can achieve those purposes through other means, and the applicable legal, regulatory, tax, accounting, or other requirements. In some cases, we may anonymize your Personal Data (so that it can no longer be associated with you) for research or statistical purposes, in which case we may use this information indefinitely without further notice to you.

security_measures.title: 9. What Security Measures Do We Apply?
security_measures.content: We have designed our systems with your security and privacy in mind. We also maintain reasonable commercial technical, administrative, and physical safeguards to ensure your Personal Data is treated securely and in accordance with this Privacy Policy and applicable laws, and to prevent unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction of your Personal Data. We may, for example, use encryption technology to secure your Personal Data during transmission to our Platform, as well as external firewall and host firewall technology to prevent network-level attacks. Access to this Personal Data is only permitted to authorized employees, contractors, and agents who need to know your Personal Data in connection with performing their services. We also follow the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard when handling credit card data. It is important for you to protect yourself from unauthorized access to your password and the devices used to access our Services. You are also responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your password (e.g., ensure you log out when finished using a shared device). While we will do our best to protect your Personal Data, unfortunately, the transmission of information over the internet is not completely secure.

data_rights.title: 10. What Are Your Data Rights?
data_rights.content: In certain cases, you have the following data rights:
data_rights.information_access: Right to Obtain Information About Personal Data Collected From You: If you have any inquiries about how your Personal Data is collected and used, please contact us via email. Many of our Services also include settings that provide you with options regarding how your Personal Data is used.
data_rights.data_access: Right to Access Your Personal Data: You can access a wide range of information about your account and interactions with the Platform for the purpose of viewing and updating your Personal Data in most cases. Examples of Personal Data you can easily access on the Platform include: up-to-date information regarding recent orders; personally identifiable information (including name, email, password, date of birth, communications, and customized advertising preferences); payment settings (including credit card information); email notification settings.
data_rights.request_data_access: Right to Request Access to Your Personal Data: In certain cases, you have the right to request access to your Personal Data that we hold in a clear and readable format if technically feasible. To make such a request, please contact us via email.
data_rights.request_data_deletion: Right to Request Deletion of Your Personal Data: You have the right to request the destruction and erasure of your Personal Data to the extent permitted by applicable law. To make such a request, please contact customer service. However, please note that we may not always be able to comply with your deletion request for specific legal reasons, which you will be notified of.
data_rights.withdraw_consent: Withdraw Consent/Right to Object: You can withdraw consent for marketing data at any time. You can opt out of receiving future marketing communications from us at any time by adjusting your customer communication preferences through the unsubscribe link in emails. You may also disable cookies by changing the settings on your browser. If you disable cookies, this will affect our Platform, and you may not be able to access certain areas of our Platform or use all its functions.
data_rights.request_data_correction: Right to Request Correction of Personal Data: You can request the correction and amendment of your Personal Data at any time by contacting us via email.
data_rights.no_fees: You will not be required to pay any fees for exercising your rights, unless otherwise stipulated by law. If you submit a request to exercise your rights, you will receive a response within the time limits stipulated by applicable law.

privacy_policy_changes.title: 11. How Do We Change Our Privacy Policy?
privacy_policy_changes.content: As our business constantly evolves, our Privacy Policy may also need to change. However, we will notify you of any such changes by posting the updated version of the Privacy Policy on the Platform, and each change will take effect upon posting on the Platform or on the date we designate as the 'effective date.' We may send you periodic reminder emails regarding our notices and terms, but you should regularly review our Platform to stay informed of recent changes. It is your responsibility to regularly review the Privacy Policy. Your continued use of the Platform after any such change constitutes your consent to this Privacy Policy as amended.

contact_us.title: 12. Contact Us
contact_us.content: If you have any concerns or inquiries regarding your Personal Data on the Platform, please contact us via email with a detailed statement.

We only share your information with third parties as described below and with companies that follow protective practices at least as stringent as those described in these Terms:
data_sharing.affiliated_companies: Other Companies: We provide our Services, and we may engage with our affiliated companies and/or non-affiliated service providers (e.g., logistics companies contracted to deliver products to you, marketing companies, payment processing companies to process online transactions, data analytics, and more) and share your Personal Data with these companies. We may engage other companies in your transactions, which may store your information in a digital wallet to make your use of our Services more efficient. You understand that it is important for these companies to access relevant Personal Data to perform their functions and tasks. We will ensure that these companies do not use your Personal Data for other purposes. We may also receive Personal Data from these companies (e.g., updated delivery and address information), which we may use (e.g., to correct our records and deliver your next purchases). These companies will be contractually obligated to respect the confidentiality of your Personal Data and not use it for any other purposes.
data_sharing.third_parties: Third Parties: We may share your Personal Data with any third party for the purposes outlined in Section 5 above. However, we ensure that all companies follow protective practices at least as stringent as those described in these Terms. We also do not allow our non-affiliated third-party service providers to use your Personal Data for their own purposes and only permit them to process your Personal Data for specific purposes in accordance with our instructions. You can request that we or the third party stop sending you marketing communications at any time by specifying your marketing preferences on the Platform, following unsubscribe links in any marketing message sent to you, or contacting us via email at any time.
data_sharing.google_recaptcha: Use of Google reCAPTCHA: We use Google reCAPTCHA on our Website to protect against spam and abuse and to ensure the security of our Services. reCAPTCHA works by collecting device and software information, such as device and application data, and sending it to Google for analysis. The use of reCAPTCHA is subject to Google's Privacy Policy and Terms of Service. By interacting with reCAPTCHA, your use of the service is subject to these policies.
data_sharing.promotional_activities: Additionally, you may be required to provide additional Personal Data to participate in some of our market research activities, including competitions and promotions (e.g., additional Personal Data to determine your eligibility to win a prize). This Personal Data may be collected by us or by our participating sponsors or vendors for the promotion. If you choose not to provide certain Personal Data, you may not be able to benefit from the competitions and promotions. If you decide to participate, please be aware that you should review the third-party privacy policies to understand how they use any Personal Data collected.
data_sharing.business_transfers: Business Ownership Transfers: As our business evolves, we may engage in the purchase or sale of other companies or services. In these transactions, customer Personal Data is typically included in the transferred assets but will remain protected by any existing privacy policy (unless the customer naturally agrees otherwise). In the event of our acquisition or a significant portion of our assets being acquired, customer Personal Data will be included as part of the transferred assets.
data_sharing.platform_protection: Platform and Others Protection: We release users' Personal Data when we believe such release is appropriate to comply with the law, law enforcement investigations, and to protect our rights, the rights of our users, or others, their property, or safety. This includes exchanging Personal Data with other companies and organizations for various reasons, such as fraud protection and reducing credit risks.

data_transfer_outside_saudi.title: 7. Is My Personal Data Transferred Outside Saudi Arabia?
data_transfer_outside_saudi.content: To facilitate providing our Services to you, it may sometimes be necessary for us to share your Personal Data with other members of the Noon group of companies and service providers located outside Saudi Arabia. Such transfers are necessary for reasons including, but not limited to, IT infrastructure, data storage, and Platform management, including payment processing. When we transfer Personal Data outside Saudi Arabia, we ensure that the Personal Data is transferred in accordance with these Terms and as stipulated by the laws applicable within Saudi Arabia.

data_storage.title: 8. How Do We Store Your Personal Data and For How Long?
data_storage.content: The Personal Data we collect from you may be transferred, stored, and processed by employees working for us or one of our service providers. These employees may, among other things, be engaged in fulfilling your order, processing your payment details, and providing support services. We will store your information as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes specified in these Terms or as permitted or required by law. To determine the appropriate retention period for Personal Data, we consider the amount, nature, and sensitivity of the Personal Data, the potential risks of harm from unauthorized use or disclosure of your Personal Data, the purposes for which we process your Personal Data and whether we can achieve those purposes through other means, and the applicable legal, regulatory, tax, accounting, or other requirements. In some cases, we may anonymize your Personal Data (so that it can no longer be associated with you) for research or statistical purposes, in which case we may use this information indefinitely without further notice to you.

security_measures.title: 9. What Security Measures Do We Apply?
security_measures.content: We have designed our systems with your security and privacy in mind. We also maintain reasonable commercial technical, administrative, and physical safeguards to ensure your Personal Data is treated securely and in accordance with these Terms and applicable laws, and to prevent unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction of your Personal Data. We may, for example, use encryption technology to secure your Personal Data during transmission to our Platform, as well as external firewall and host firewall technology to prevent network-level attacks. Access to this Personal Data is only permitted to authorized employees, contractors, and agents who need to know your Personal Data in connection with performing their services. We also follow the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard when handling credit card data. It is important for you to protect yourself from unauthorized access to your password and the devices used to access our Services. You are also responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your password (e.g., ensure you log out when finished using a shared device). While we will do our best to protect your Personal Data, unfortunately, the transmission of information over the internet is not completely secure.

data_rights.title: 10. What Are Your Data Rights?
data_rights.content: In certain cases, you have the following data rights:
data_rights.information_access: Right to Obtain Information About Personal Data Collected From You: If you have any inquiries about how your Personal Data is collected and used, please contact us via email. Many of our Services also include settings that provide you with options regarding how your Personal Data is used.
data_rights.data_access: Right to Access Your Personal Data: You can access a wide range of information about your account and interactions with the Platform for the purpose of viewing and updating your Personal Data in most cases. Examples of Personal Data you can easily access on the Platform include: up-to-date information regarding recent orders; personally identifiable information (including name, email, password, date of birth, communications, and customized advertising preferences); payment settings (including credit card information); email notification settings.
data_rights.request_data_access: Right to Request Access to Your Personal Data: In certain cases, you have the right to request access to your Personal Data that we hold in a clear and readable format if technically feasible. To make such a request, please contact us via email.
data_rights.request_data_deletion: Right to Request Deletion of Your Personal Data: You have the right to request the destruction and erasure of your Personal Data to the extent permitted by applicable law. To make such a request, please contact customer service. However, please note that we may not always be able to comply with your deletion request for specific legal reasons, which you will be notified of.
data_rights.withdraw_consent: Withdraw Consent/Right to Object: You can withdraw consent for marketing data at any time. You can opt out of receiving future marketing communications from us at any time by adjusting your customer communication preferences through the unsubscribe link in emails. You may also disable cookies by changing the settings on your browser. If you disable cookies, this will affect our Platform, and you may not be able to access certain areas of our Platform or use all its functions.
data_rights.request_data_correction: Right to Request Correction of Personal Data: You can request the correction and amendment of your Personal Data at any time by contacting us via email.
data_rights.no_fees: You will not be required to pay any fees for exercising your rights, unless otherwise stipulated by law. If you submit a request to exercise your rights, you will receive a response within the time limits stipulated by applicable law.

terms_changes.title: 11. How Do We Change Our Terms?
terms_changes.content: As our business constantly evolves, our Terms may also need to change. However, we will notify you of any such changes by posting the updated version of the Terms on the Platform, and each change will take effect upon posting on the Platform or on the date we designate as the 'effective date.' We may send you periodic reminder emails regarding our notices and terms, but you should regularly review our Platform to stay informed of recent changes. It is your responsibility to regularly review the Terms. Your continued use of the Platform after any such change constitutes your consent to these Terms as amended.

contact_us.title: 12. Contact Us
contact_us.content: If you have any concerns or inquiries regarding your Personal Data on the Platform, please contact us via email with a detailed statement.
